General.Name: Jinfu Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: JinFu Technology Co., Ltd. primarily engages in the research and development, production, and sales of plastic packaging products in China and internationally. It offers plastic anti-theft bottle caps, other plastic packaging fields, and other types of bottle caps, as well as metal pull ring cover and handle. The company offers bottle, including drinking water type, seasoning type, medical type, and BIB type. It serves beverage industry, including the packaged drinking water industry. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Dongguan, China.

1.Name: Ms. Liyan  Du
1.Title: Deputy GM, CFO, Accounting Supervisor & Non Independent Director
